nodes.text: The Dromon was a Ripoblus frigate that attempted to aid its forces at the Battle of Science Station Youst during the Sepan campaign. It was destroyed while attacking the Victory-class Star Destroyer Protector.
A dromon was a class of warship in the ancient Byzantine navy.
In the game Star Wars: TIE Fighter Dromon is a Ripoblus frigate, but TIE Fighter: The Official Strategy Guide erroneously classifies it as a Dimok frigate.
